subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: You tube?
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
Don't matter to me!

It's become blatantly obvious to me that you're dealing with something 
outside the realm of "ghosthunters". What they are, I guess none of us 
know yet. But it certainly is fascinating!

Zack

On Fri, 9 Nov 2007, Frank Sumption wrote:

>
> Well this'll go over like a fart church, I thought this was private e-mail.  Ghost research, and ITC research seem to be two different things or fields, and maybe they should kept seperate.
>
> PS I'll delete that off the group when I get home. And I'll be careful to keep my comments to myself.
>
